definition: Northern Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms (398-439)
north/(classical) to be defeated
cool/cold

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
to let sth cool down

sentences.english: As for"new coins found by Liang, "it probably founded by in Northern Liang.
sentences.chinese: 至於“涼造新泉”，則可能是北涼沮渠蒙遜所鑄。

sentences.english: Dharmaksema is a famous translator in the 5th century in Northern Liang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 曇無讖是公元五世紀初北涼著名的譯經大師。

Eastern Wei of the Northern dynasties (534-550), formed from the break-up of Wei of the Northern Dynasties 北魏

Bamboo Annals, early chronicle of Chinese ancient history, written c. 300 BC
Tao Zongyi (c. 1329-1410), Yuan dynasty scholar
to die of old age/to live to a ripe old age/(fig.) (of sth) to come to an end (after a long period of service)
ancient Central Asian city state, flourished in first millennium AD, in modern Aksu 阿克蘇地區|阿克苏地区, Xinjiang
